infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: ChallengeU uses your calendar to add liked meetups and joined team games.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: ChallengeU uses your calendar to add liked meetups and joined team games.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsWriteOnlyAccessUsageDescripti: ChallengeU uses your calendar to add liked meetups and joined team games.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: ChallengeU reads your steps, distance, and active energy to show fitness progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: ChallengeU does not write health data, but iOS requires this permission key for HealthKit access.
